description:
Alan`s Charizard is the evolved form of Alan`s Charmander and is Alan`s main traveling companion. It can also Mega Evolve into Mega Charizard X during battles.
Ayaka`s Absol battled against Alan`s Charizard in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle in a forest in Kalos but after a fierce battle Ayaka`s Absol ended up loosing the fight and Alan`s Charizard won.
When Siebold approached Alan, Alan told him that he wanted to try Zumi`s unofficial menu. The two battled in a 1-on-1 Mega Evolution battle and despite the type disadvantage, Alan`s Charizard held it own for most of the battle against until it finally lost. Siebold was impressed with Alan`s Charizard as it was powerful enough to corner him even with a type disadvantage. He complemented it on an excellent battle as it had been a while since he "last had fresh meat with a backbone". Siebold also commented that Alan`s Charizard speed and power are exquisite and that it had an excellent texture.
name: Lizardon (Alan)
